mapper.sql: select no, title, writer, content, view_cnt, to_char(reg_date, 'yy-mm-dd') as reg_date from t_board
mapper.select: select no, title, writer, content, view_cnt, to_char(reg_date, 'yy-mm-dd') as reg_date from t_board order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_board(no, title, writer, content) values(seq_t_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
